title: Krishna Air Travels
text: Krishna Air Travels is a travel agency in Kharagpur. Their main office is located near Azad Hall of Residence . Vans are available at any time (previous booking required in case of times between 8 pm to 8 am) and students can book them over phones. Other types of vehicles (such as cars and buses) are also available.

title: Fare
text: • From the campus to the KGP Railway Station, the fare is Rs. 140-160 depending on the number of stops to be made inside the campus before leaving for the station, and the time of day / night that you are travelling at
